# CRbasic1x

> CRBasic 1.x — Reference documentation for Campbell Scientific CRBasic 1.x dataloggers. This directory contains concise, LLM-friendly links to the most useful human-readable files: short guides, instruction references, parameter examples, and assets used by the docs.

Important notes:

- CRBasic 1.x documentation covers older datalogger platforms. If you are working with CRBasic 3xx series, consult the corresponding `llms.txt` files in the sibling folders.
- Links below are relative to this file and point into the repository's documentation files.

## Docs

- [Programming tips and overview](./Info/programmingtips.md): general usage tips and best practices.
- [Program file summary](./Info/programfilesummary.md): quick reference for program files and extensions.
- [Sample program](./Info/sampleprogram.md): a short example program and explanation.
- [CRBasic program structure](./Info/crbasicprogramstructure.md): layout and structure of CRBasic programs.

## Instructions

- [Instruction reference directory](./Instructions/): alphabetical list of instruction documentation files (e.g. `abs.md`, etc.).

## Parameters

- [Parameter files directory](./parameters/): example parameter and configuration files used in sample programs.
